std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Hilletje Aletta Johanna Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1783-1809, page 158. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/3. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 667
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit exact match to the surname with Hilletje Aletta exact match to the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Hilletje Aletta Johanna Smit baptism on 30 Mar 1800, daughter of Everhardus Johannis Smit & Maria Brand.

std_narrative.citation:
Hilletje, daughter of Everhardus Johannis Smit & Maria Brand, was baptised on 30 March 1800. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Hilletje Aletta Johanna Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1783-1809, page 158. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/3. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 667
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit exact match to the surname with Hilletje Aletta exact match to the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Hilletje Aletta Johanna Smit baptism on 30 Mar 1800, daughter of Everhardus Johannis Smit & Maria Brand.
